channel.title: Community-rss on MapStruct
channel.description: Recent content in Community-rss on MapStruct

item.title: Getting Help
item.description:
You’are using MapStruct and ran into a problem?

First check out the reference guide. If that doesn’t help answering your question you may join the MapStruct Google group or hop by the MapStruct Gitter room.

To report a bug or request a new feature use the MapStruct issue tracker. Note that bug reports should be accompanied by a test case demonstrating the issue.

item.title: Other Resources on the Web
item.description:
Blog posts

  • Bean Mapping mit MapStruct; Introduction to MapStruct (German);
  • mapstruct - Java bean mappings; First 3rd party post on MapStruct ever :)
  • MapStruct; Introductory post on MapStruct with code examples
  • Don’t get lost, take the map! – DTO survival code; DTO mapping with MapStruct
  • Wer ist der optimale Java Bean Mapper?; Comparison of several mapping APIs, recommending to use MapStruct (German)

Presentations

  • Machst Du noch Reflection oder annotierst Du schon? Bean-Mapping mit MapStruct; Slides from talk on MapStruct given at MATHEMA Campus 2015 (German)
  • MapStruct - Der neue Stern am Bean-Mapping Himmel?!; Slides from talk on MapStruct given at W-JAX 2015 (German)

Miscellaneous

  • Using DTOs; JHipster documentation on integrating MapStruct to map DTOs
